SELECT id, username, password, email, avatar, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, role, display_name AS displayName FROM user WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT id, username, password, email, avatar, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, role, display_name AS displayName FROM user WHERE id = #{id}
